name: Left Neck Stretch
how_to_perform:
1. Slowly turn your head to the left, keeping your right ear towards your right shoulder.

2. Bring your chin in towards your left shoulder, stretching the muscles on the right side of your neck.

3. Hold for a brief moment to feel the stretch.

4. Return to the starting position by turning your head back to center, facing straight ahead.

5. Repeat on the other side.
short_summary: The Left Neck Stretch is an exercise that targets the muscles of the neck and shoulder region, helping to improve flexibility and reduce tension in these areas.
